Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In these posts people discuss a range of issues from boosting defence spending in Australia to a $10m SMS sender ID registry to reduce the impact of fraudulent texts on Australians. Additionally journalists Zoe Daniel and Jack Snape are both featured in posts expressing their views on issues related to women's rights society and the London Marathon. The State Opposition has called for a moratorium on power disconnections in WA to tackle the issue of thousands of West Australians experiencing power outages.
